definitions.definition: ( uncountable , countable ) A fatty layer of adipose tissue found immediately beneath the epidermis of whales and other cetaceans ( infraorder Cetacea ).

subdefinitions.definition: ( uncountable ) A fatty layer of adipose tissue found in other animals which keeps them warm , especially Arctic animals such as sea lions and Antarctic animals such as penguins .
( uncountable , informal , chiefly derogatory and offensive ) A person 's fat tissue , usually when regarded as excessive and unsightly .
( countable , by extension , archaic ) A jellyfish ( subphylum Medusozoa ).

definitions.definition: ( countable , chiefly derogatory ) An act of crying or weeping freely and noisily .

main_definition: ( uncountable , countable ) A fatty layer of adipose tissue found immediately beneath the epidermis of whales and other cetaceans ( infraorder Cetacea ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable , chiefly derogatory ) An act of crying or weeping freely and noisily .

definitions.definition: One who blubs ( “ cries or weeps freely and noisily ” ) ; a blubberer .

main_definition: One who blubs ( “ cries or weeps freely and noisily ” ) ; a blubberer .
